backend/main.mo: Defines main backend actor with types for subjects, chapters, questions, stats, and comparison logic, integrating storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting old question records to a new format with added image fields while preserving other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for documentation or reference.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Begins an architecture overview describing the frontend’s structure and technologies.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app and including two external script injections plus the main module entry.
frontend/index.ts: Defines a simple TypeScript shape for user stats with bigint fields.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and global layout, handling authentication, profile setup flow, and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGateC: File content not provided; presumably implements admin access UI for entering and validating admin password.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a form for users to enter and save their name, showing loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/contributor/Cani: Shows a timeout warning with retry, reload, and home navigation options when the canister is slow to respond.
frontend/src/components/contributor/Cont: Presents a password form for contributor access with validation, login checks, and unimplemented unlock handling.
frontend/src/components/contributor/PdfI: Displays a scrollable preview of extracted PDF questions with badges, images, and remove/save controls.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: A React error boundary that catches render errors and shows a global error screen.
Renders an error message UI with options to reload the page or return home.
Defines the main layout with header, navigation, login button, mobile drawer, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobilePag: Simple layout wrapper applying max-width and padding for mobile-friendly pages.
frontend/src/components/practice/Questio: Renders numbered navigation buttons for questions, highlighting current and answered ones.
frontend/src/components/practice/YearSel: A dialog component letting users pick a year from a list and confirm selection for practice categories.
frontend/src/config/liveDeployment.ts: Defines live deployment names and provides validation helpers for ensuring naming rules are met.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Empty placeholder file for future authorization hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, manages login, logout, and identity loading with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeTimer.ts: Implements a timer hook that tracks elapsed time with start, stop, and reset functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, chapters, questions, stats, and admin checks via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining a warm color theme, dark mode variables, and basic global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Empty page file reserved for admin-related UI.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterCategorySelect: Displays category options for a chapter, determines available years for PYQ categories, and navigates to practice pages or year selection dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterSelectPage.tsx: Displays chapters for a selected subject, fetching data and navigating to chapter categories.
frontend/src/pages/ContributorPage.tsx: Provides contributor tools for managing chapters and questions, including creation, editing, deletion, and PDF import.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen offering navigation to student mode, rankings, and contributor mode based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PracticePage.tsx: Handles practice sessions by loading questions, tracking progress, saving attempts, and submitting results.
frontend/src/pages/RankingsPage.tsx: Shows overall and subject-specific leaderboards with user ranking and stats.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Displays detailed test results including accuracy, timing, and question review for a completed session.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectSelectPage.tsx: Page for choosing a subject, rendering cards that navigate to chapter selection.
frontend/src/types/practice.ts: Defines practice session, question attempt, and per‑question answer types.
frontend/src/utils/pdf/pdfjsClient.ts: Loads PDF.js from CDN and exposes helper types and functions for PDF parsing.
frontend/src/utils/pdf/pdfSolutionMappin: Utilities to detect, parse, map, and format solution text extracted from PDFs.
frontend/src/utils/pdf/pdfTextReconstruc: Rebuilds PDF text with whitespace and extracts full text per page.
frontend/src/utils/pdf/pdfToQuestions.ts: Handles PDF loading, text extraction, section detection, and question parsing.
frontend/src/utils/practiceProgressStora: Stores and retrieves practice progress in localStorage using composite keys.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides URL and session parameter retrieval, storage, and cleanup utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state describing PDF import fidelity issues, missing figures, and a pending admin question‑deletion feature along with related requirements and issues.
